list.title: disableButton
list.description: Disables button so user cannot click it

list.title: enableButton
list.description: Enables button so user can click it

list.title: fortunes
list.description: Array of general, college, and collage-romance type fortunes

list.title: getRandomFortune
list.description: This function will get a random fortune from the fortune array and make sure it does not match the previous one

list.title: handleFortune
list.description: Generates random fortunes. Called when the app finishes analyzing the palm.

list.title: showFortune
list.description: Displays the fortune and if voice toggle is checked, reads out the fortune

list.title: speakFortune
list.description: Reads out the fortune using speech synthesis

list.title: stopRotation
list.description: Function to handle the mouseout event

list.title: synth
list.description: Added options for different voices using voice synthesis
